prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a risk assessment expert. Analyze the following risk factors to determine if they indicate high risk.
You must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}

Risk Factors to analyze:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 11 inches and weighs 180 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 3 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.
